description:
Another one of http://anidb.net/ch39363 [Hajime]`s best friends. Atsushi is friendly and easygoing; his personality is the balance between http://anidb.net/ch39375 [Toshio]`s quiet reserve and http://anidb.net/ch39374 [Jirou]`s loud, playful nature. Just like his buddies, Atsushi is big into science fiction, and is patiently waiting for the day when all his favorite stories will become a reality.
Source: shingu.rightstuf.com
name: Kawamori Atsushi
